channel.title: Help me please
channel.description: how do i edit items coulors or make weapons stats change and actually work instead of just saying it does and it realy doesn't,is there a program i use to make its stats change and have effect and how do i make them permanent so like every time you equip it, bonuses like strength and stuff. please help me soon[br][size=1]Posted on: September 28, 2007, 01:47:33 PM[/size][hr]any one?
